content.raw:
---

From [Gazebo Answers](http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/558/update-drcsim-setupsh/):

It would be nice to include
 
    export GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH=/usr/share/drcsim-1.3/models:$GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH

in drcsim-1.x/setup.sh

Currently to access the Atlas meshes we do something like: file://../models/atlas/meshes/ltorso.dae

---

As of drcsim 1.3.0, we do this in `setup.sh`:

    # Step 4: modify Gazebo configuration.
    export GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH=/usr/share/drcsim-1.3/worlds:$GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH
    export GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH=/usr/share/drcsim-1.3/models:$GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH
    export GAZEBO_PLUGIN_PATH=/usr/lib/drcsim-1.3/plugins:$GAZEBO_PLUGIN_PATH

Presumably, the setting of `GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH` was intended to accomplish what's being asked here.  But the [user guide](http://gazebosim.org/user_guide/started__components__env.html) doesn't even list `GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH`, so perhaps something's gotten out of date.  Or perhaps the `models` directory should be present in both lists and the user guide is missing documentation on `GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH`.

From Gazebo Answers:

It would be nice to include

export GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH=/usr/share/drcsim-1.3/models:$GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH

in drcsim-1.x/setup.sh

Currently to access the Atlas meshes we do something like: file://../models/atlas/meshes/ltorso.dae

As of drcsim 1.3.0, we do this in setup.sh:

# Step 4: modify Gazebo configuration.
export GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH=/usr/share/drcsim-1.3/worlds:$GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH
export GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH=/usr/share/drcsim-1.3/models:$GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH
export GAZEBO_PLUGIN_PATH=/usr/lib/drcsim-1.3/plugins:$GAZEBO_PLUGIN_PATH

Presumably, the setting of GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH was intended to accomplish what's being asked here. But the user guide doesn't even list GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH, so perhaps something's gotten out of date. Or perhaps the models directory should be present in both lists and the user guide is missing documentation on GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH.
